desc.p: • A minimum of 3 alphanumeric characters and maximum of 35 alphanumeric characters can be entered.
Valid ID for the Rating Agency.
• A minimum of 3 alphanumeric characters and maximum of 10 alphanumeric characters can be entered.
• A minimum of 3 alphanumeric characters and maximum of 15 alphanumeric characters can be entered.
Flag to indicate the type of agency.
• The input options available in the field are INTERNAL,EXTERNAL and SUPERVISORY
